existing_features.title: Create a single-page portfolio website with the following sections: Hero (name, tagline, call-to-action), About Me, Skills, Projects, and Contact. Each section should be navigable via a sticky top navigation bar.

Apply a cohesive, modern dark-mode visual theme with a monochrome-and-amber accent palette, clean sans-serif typography, subtle gradient backgrounds, and smooth section transitions. The design should feel professional and creative, suitable for a developer or designer portfolio.
Generate and display a stylized abstract hero background image and a professional avatar placeholder image, served as static assets from frontend/public/assets/generated.

new_feature_requests.summary: Store portfolio data (bio, skills, projects) in the backend so that the content is persisted and can be read by the frontend.
